actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A resolution to provide for the appointment of a committee to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Judge Walter L. Nixon, Jr.

summary.text: Provides for the appointment of a committee of Senators to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Walter L. Nixon, Jr., Judge of the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of Mississippi.

titles.title: A resolution to provide for the appointment of a committee to receive and to report evidence with respect to articles of impeachment against Judge Walter L. Nixon, Jr.
